DataElement.preferredName: Radiolabeled Monoclonal Antibody Preparative Regimen Plan Administration Total Medication Dose Integer::1 Decimal Place Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 1 decimal place numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the planned total dosage of the radiolabeled monoclonal antibody preparative regimen that was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiolabeled Monoclonal Antibody Preparative Regimen Plan Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any compound that has been joined with a radioactive substance._An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous fast-growing cells i.e., hybridoma. Hybridoma cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis, and treatment._The chemotherapy and/or radiation given to blood, marrow or cord blood transplant patients prior to transplant to kill diseased cells and/or make space for healthy new marrow and/or suppress the immune system so graft rejection does not occur._To devise, contrive, or formed in design._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any compound that has been joined with a radioactive substance.:An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous population of hybrid cells i.e., hybridoma; hybrid cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis and treatment.:The chemotherapy and/or radiation given to bone marrow transplant patients prior to transplant to kill diseased cells and/or make space for healthy new marrow and/or suppress the immune system so graft rejection does not occur.

Concepts.definition: Any compound that has been joined with a radioactive substance.

An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous fast-growing cells i.e., hybridoma. Hybridoma cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis, and treatment.

The chemotherapy or radiation given prior to blood, marrow, cord blood transplant, or cell infusion to kill diseased cells and make space for the healthy new graft and/or suppress the immune system so rejection does not occur.

Property.preferredDefinition: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.:The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: . Updated def for prep reg, no version needed. AK 12/20/13

ValueDomain.preferredName: Total Medication Dose 1 Decimal Place Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Total Medication Dose Integer::1 Decimal Place Value
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2010-06-17: Added the missing concept for "Decimal Place" in the representation term, long name, and definition. Updated the decimal place - RA

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the planned total do
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the planned total dosage of the radiolabeled monoclonal antibody preparative regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:3040382
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedSubstanceAdministration > PlannedActivity > StudyActivity > DefinedSubstanceAdministration.periodProductDoseTotal.PQ.value WHERE DefinedProcedure > Material.Product.typeCode = "Radio Labeled" AND Product.classCode = "monoclonal antibody" AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedSubjectActivityGroup.nameCode = "Perform preparative regimen"

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-8-5 ak System generated def displayed as alt def. 2010-06-17:Added the missing concept for "Decimal Place" in the long name, and definition - RA
